content: I just saw that there’s now a bilingual voters WhatsApp channel. https://www.nbcnews.com/news/latino/kamala-harris-latino-voters-whatsapp-channel-rcna167176 - I’d love to be able to create one for Vietnamese and Asian Americans. How could I go about doing this with the support of the campaign? This is my aunt, she’d be happy to help: https://themarkup.org/languages-of-misinformation/2023/11/16/meet-the-vietnamese-grandmother-fighting-misinformation-one-youtube-video-at-a-time

(Latinos Con Harris-Walz is an official coalition, and they've setup a [WhatsApp account](https://kamalaharris.link/JoinWhatsApp )).  If you're asking the campaign to add an official account for AANHPIs, then you'll have to ask AANHPIs for Harris.  You can join their user group on Reach by adding campaign key: DFBBJJ
Thanks! It looks like that campaign key just adds me to the Democrats user group.
No, "The Democrats" is the DNC's campaign.  You've posted your question in the correct user group for AAPI.  By the way, you're free to create personal accounts on any platform.

I'm unsure if the DNC is still accepting [DNCC Virtual Creator Correspondent Request Form](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdQi17ouG-f7t8akFws99Bya479oVR36vQG6YOsERaUnwX8cw/viewform), but you can try.  You can also join the [Content Brigade](https://events.democrats.org/event/637836/).
